prompt.task_guidelines:
You are an expert at understanding lexical relationships.
 Given two words A and B, classify the relationship between them into one of: {labels}. RANDOM refers to an arbitrary relationship. SYN means that the words are synonyms. ANT means that the two words are antonyms. HYPER means that the two words are hypernyms. PART_OF means that the second word is a subset of the first word.
prompt.output_guidelines: You will answer with just the the correct output label and nothing else.
